title: Analytics Controller
description:
Implement Analytics Controller for Dashboard Data Retrieval

Create a backend controller to handle analytics queries and serve aggregated data for dashboard visualizations and reporting features.

Requirements:
- Design and implement a controller with endpoints for common analytics queries (e.g., user metrics, activity trends, performance statistics)
- Support flexible date range filtering (daily, weekly, monthly, custom ranges)
- Implement efficient data aggregation to minimize database load
- Add query parameter validation and sanitization
- Return data in a format optimized for dashboard consumption (pre-aggregated, properly structured)
- Include appropriate error handling for invalid queries or missing data
- Add pagination or data limits for large result sets
- Implement caching strategy for frequently requested analytics data
- Ensure proper authentication and authorization checks
- Add rate limiting to prevent abuse of resource-intensive queries

Edge Cases to Consider:
- Handle queries for date ranges with no data
- Manage timezone differences in date-based queries
- Handle concurrent requests for the same analytics data
- Consider performance impact of complex aggregations

Dependencies:
- Database schema must support efficient analytics queries (indexes on timestamp/date fields)
- Authentication/authorization middleware must be in place
- Dashboard frontend requirements should inform API response structure
